Transmission Modeling
=====================
This `transmission` package provides facilities for simulation and 
fitting of individual level disease transmission models within a
hospital ward or similar closed setting.


Simulation
==========
Simulating a dataset is performed with the `doSim` function.
It has several basic options to control the simulation.

* `capacity` - the capacity of hospital.  There cannot be more patients in the
  ward at any given time than `capacity`.
